title: BOC marks agency active
custom_preconds: GIVEN the BOC opens an Agency profile
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks edit
AND clicks "Active" checkbox making it checked
AND user clicks save
AND logs in/out again
custom_expected: THEN the agency appears in any agency drop downs in the system

title: BOC marks agency inactive
custom_preconds: GIVEN the BOC opens an Active agency profile
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks edit
AND clicks the checkmark in the checkbox so it disappears
AND clicks save
AND logs in/out again
custom_expected: THEN will NOT show up in an Agency drop downs in the system

title: BOC sees errors to correct
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is unsure if the profile is complete
custom_steps:
WHEN a required field on an agency profile is missed
AND save is clicked
custom_expected: THEN an error message stating the missing fields or errors to the profile is shown

title: Basic Club User
custom_preconds: GIVEN a basic club user wants to view an agency
custom_steps: WHEN a basic user logs in
custom_expected: THEN they should NOT be able to see any agency profiles or the widget

title: Club Admin User
custom_preconds: GIVEN a club admin wants to update a player's agency info
custom_steps:
WHEN they open the player/agent mapping roster
AND make changes to a players agency using the dropdown
AND click submit
custom_expected: THEN the player/agent mapping update is submitted successfully and LRD receives item on approvals clipboard

title: Basic BOC User
custom_preconds: GIVEN a basic BOC user wants to view an agency
custom_steps:
WHEN they login to the system
AND click on an agency
custom_expected: THEN the agency profile loads in view mode

title: LRD Admin User
custom_preconds: GIVEN a LRD admin wants to view, create, or update an agency
custom_steps:
WHEN an LRD admin logs into the system
AND clicks Create on Agency widget
OR clicks on an existing agency
custom_expected: THEN they have the ability to view, create, and update an agency

title: BOC marks agent active
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user wants to mark an agent as active
AND the user is in an Agent's profile
AND the user is in 'edit' mode
custom_steps:
WHEN the user checks the box
AND clicks save
custom_expected: THEN the Agent will be saved as active

title: BOC marks agent inactive
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user wants to mark an Agent as inactive
AND is in an Agent's profile
AND is in 'edit' mode
custom_steps:
WHEN the user unchecks the box
AND clicks save
custom_expected: THEN the Agent's profile will be inactive

title: BOC sees errors to correct
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is unsure if the profile is complete
custom_steps:
WHEN a required field on an agent profile is missed
AND save is clicked
custom_expected: THEN an error message stating the missing fields or errors to the profile is shown

title: Basic Club User
custom_preconds: GIVEN a basic club user wants to view an agents profile
custom_steps: WHEN a basic user logs in
custom_expected: THEN user should not be able to view any agent profile

title: Club Admin User
custom_preconds: GIVEN a club admin wants to update a player's agent info
custom_steps:
WHEN they open the player/agent mapping roster
AND make changes to a players agent using the dropdown
AND click submit
custom_expected: THEN the LRD receives a notification

title: Basic BOC User
custom_preconds: GIVEN a basic BOC user wants to view an agent profile
custom_steps:
WHEN they login to the system
AND click on an agent profile
custom_expected: THEN the agent profile loads in view mode

title: LRD Admin User
custom_preconds: GIVEN a LRD admin wants to view, create, or update an agent profile
custom_steps:
WHEN an LRD admin logs into the system
AND clicks Create on Agent widget
OR clicks on an existing agent profile
custom_expected: THEN they have the ability to view, create, and update an agent profile

title: BOC views Flags and Comments
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing the approval widget
custom_steps:
WHEN the user clicks on a flag
OR comment bubble
custom_expected: THEN the associated flag/comment will display in a popover

title: BOC views one attached File
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing their approval widget
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks on a file with only one attachment
custom_expected: THEN the file automatically downloads

title: BOC views multiple files
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing a multi-file attachment to the approval clipboard
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the file icon
custom_expected: THEN a list will appear in a popover

title: BOC downloads attached file
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has completed [C70774]
custom_steps: WHEN user selects file from populated list
custom_expected: THEN that file will download

title: Disabled hovering
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is viewing their approvals widget
custom_steps: WHEN user hovers over flag/comment/file icon
custom_expected: THEN nothing happens

title: Valid file types only
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants to attach a file to a contract
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks browse
custom_expected:
THEN file browser launches 
AND only PDF files are clickable

title: Disable hover to view comment
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants to view the comments associated with a file
custom_steps: WHEN the user hovers over the comment bubble
custom_expected: THEN nothing happens

title: Enable click to view comment
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has completed [C70767]
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks comment bubble
custom_expected: THEN comments are displayed in popover

title: Enter complex language in a Bonus clause
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user wants to enter complex language in a Bonus clause
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects 'complex' from the criteria drop down on the Bonus clause
custom_expected: THEN the WISYWIG editor will display

title: Save complex language in a Bonus clause
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants to save complex language in a Bonus clause
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects complex from the language drop down
AND has entered text in the WISYWIG editor
AND clicks save
custom_expected: THEN entered text will save and appear when contract is opened next

title: Enter complex language in a vesting Option clause
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user wants to enter complex language in a vesting Option clause
AND has more than 1 option years entered
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects 'vesting' from the 'Option type' dropdown
AND selects 'complex' from the 'Criteria' dropdown
custom_expected: THEN the WISYWIG editor will display

title: Save complex language in vesting Option clause
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants to save complex language in a vesting Option clause
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects 'vesting' from the 'Option Type' dropdown
AND the user selects complex from the criteria drop down
AND has entered text in the WISYWIG editor
AND clicks save
custom_expected: THEN entered text will save and appear when contract is opened next

title: Enter complex language in a conditional Option clause
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user wants to enter complex language in a conditional Option clause
AND has more than 1 option years entered
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects 'conditional' from the 'Option type' dropdown
AND selects 'complex' from the 'Criteria' dropdown
custom_expected: THEN the WISYWIG editor will display

title: Save complex language in a conditional Option clause
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants to save complex language in an conditional Option clause
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects 'conditional' from the 'Option Type' dropdown
AND the user selects complex from the criteria drop down
AND has entered text in the WISYWIG editor
AND clicks save
custom_expected: THEN entered text will save and appear when contract is opened next

title: User can remove filter(s)
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants to remove a filter on a search
custom_steps: WHEN the trash can is clicked next to one of the filters
custom_expected: THEN the filter is deleted

title: User can remove all filters at once
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants to remove all the filters present in a search
custom_steps: WHEN the "Remove All" button is clicked
custom_expected:
THEN all of the filters are removed except for one
AND last filter row is cleared of entered criteria

title: Signing Date
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants to search for a MJC in a range of signing dates
custom_steps:
WHEN a user selects 'signing date' from dropdown
AND an operator filter
AND enters a date(s) in the datepickers column(s)
custom_expected: THEN filtered results match set filters

title: Numeric
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants to add a numeric filter (such as "Guaranteed Years") to a MJC search
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects any numeric filter from the first dropdown
AND selects an operator filter
AND enters text in the additional search field(s)
custom_expected: THEN filtered results match set filters

title: Text
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants to filter text in a MJC search
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects 'text' in first dropdown
AND selects an operator dropdown
AND enters text in the following column(s)
custom_expected: THEN desired filtered results display

title: Club Admin review players that require update
custom_preconds: GIVEN an admin wants to review players that require an update
custom_steps:
WHEN a user logs in
AND opens the player/agent mapping roster
custom_expected: THEN those players that have their dropdowns enabled require update

title: Club admin review players that do NOT require update
custom_preconds: GIVEN an admin wants to review players the do NOT require an update
custom_steps:
WHEN the user logs in
AND clicks the Player/Agent mapping form in the Action Item widget
custom_expected: THEN those players who do not require an update will not be editable

title: Club Admin receives action item to confirm current agent and agency info
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user wants to receive an action item to confirm agent/agency info
custom_steps: WHEN the user logs in after  March 1st, July 1st or November 1st
custom_expected: THEN the user receives an action item

title: Current agent and agency info appear on mapping roster form
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user wants to view a player's current agent/agency
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks player/agent mapping roster
custom_expected: THEN dropdowns should be pre-populated with current agent/agency info

title: Club Admin can complete mapping roster
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user wants to complete their mapping roster
IF a player's agent/agency are not in the system
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks 'update'
custom_expected: THEN agent/agency dropdowns will enable with all of the agent/agencies in the system

title: Club Admin can add comments
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has completed [C70936]
AND wants to add comments
custom_steps: WHEN a user clicks the comments bubble icon
custom_expected: THEN a text box should open and turn blue

title: Club Admin sees confirmation when roster submitted to LRD
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has completed the steps in [C70936]
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks 'submit'
custom_expected: THEN confirmation page will appear

title: Club Admin receives message if error is made before/on submit
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has completed the steps in [C70938]
custom_steps: WHEN the user has NOT entered in text for an agent/agency that is "Not listed"
custom_expected: THEN a blocking message will occur

title: BOC reviews player/agent mapping
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user wants to review the player/agent mapping
AND has opened the player/agent mapping from the approvals widget
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks a player's name as a hyperlink
custom_expected: THEN a new window/tab open player's profile

title: BOC reject player/agent mapping
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user wants to reject a player/agent mapping
AND has opened the player/agent mapping from the approval widget
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks 'reject' on a player's form
custom_expected:
THEN action item is created for submitting org
AND approval item is removed from approval widget
AND system displays reject notification
AND user is returned to approvals widget

title: BOC approve player/agent mapping
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user wants to approve a player/agent mapping
AND has navigated to the player/agent mapping page
custom_steps:
WHEN a user selects a profile
AND clicks 'approve'
custom_expected: THEN a confirmation page will appear listing approved player/agent mapping

title: BOC approve player/agent mapping to update and affect players' profiles
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has completed steps in [C70940]
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects anything other than 'new agent/agency' and 'confirm existing'
custom_expected: THEN their profile will be updated with any info from the form

title: Club Admin resubmit mapping roster to LRD
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has completed the steps in [C70938]
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks close and returns to action items
custom_expected:
THEN BOC will receive approval item for roster submission
AND action item will be removed from user's widget

title: BOC user can enter info for All Star starting Pitcher
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user wants to enter info for the all star starting pitcher
AND has loaded the award entry utility page in 'edit' mode
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects a 'year' and a 'league' and the 'all star starting pitcher' award
AND selects an 'org' and 'player'
AND clicks 'save'
custom_expected: THEN page should reload in view mode with saved data

AND 'org' and 'player'
AND clicks save
custom_expected: THEN page should refresh in view mode with data saved

title: System can calculate a player's place using votes/points entered
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user wants the system to calculate a player's placement in an award category
AND the user is in 'edit' mode in the award entry utility
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects an award with placements (i.e. all star selection)
AND gives numerical values to the 'votes/points' dropdown
AND assigns players to those values
AND clicks save
custom_expected:
THEN the system will place the player's in order of their votes/points
AND all data entered is saved

title: Agent/Agency info populated on player header
custom_preconds: GIVEN user wants to see a players agent/agency info quickly
custom_steps:
WHEN user logs in 
AND opens up a player profile
custom_expected:
THEN user will see the player's agent/agency information displayed at the top of the page across all player tabs
(not a fixed position on a page)
